name: Two-Faced (Develoafer)
description: Created for the 2023 Dungeon Crawler Game Jam & made in UE5. You are a detective in Brazil. The theme being duality, my original idea was to have a demon & an angel over your shoulder. But I settled for black & white. The only saving grace for gameplay was the 'unique' grid system I invented & the NPC dialogue but it only shows in print script.
